title: World War Two’s secret heroes
itunes:title: World War Two’s secret heroes
itunes:subtitle: Simon Parkin tells the incredible story of a real life game of battleships that transformed British fortunes in the battle of the Atlantic. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
Author and journalist Simon Parkin tells the incredible, but little-known, story of a real life game of battleships that transformed British fortunes in the battle of the Atlantic. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
